Name: Beginner Digital Photography, How Do I Use My Camera?
discription: Learn how to use your camera intuitively without memorizing or taking notes.

Name: Digital Photography for Beginners with DSLR cameras
discription: Learn how to take stunning photographs by mastering both the technical and creative sides of digital photography.

discription: Take dramatically better photos by learning the basic principles you need to master your DSLR camera

discription: Go beyond the Basics with advanced digital photography course. Learn Creative Scenarios, Image Editing and HD Videos.

discription: Master the in's and out's of lighting for digital photography - ISO, White Balance, and Flash settings
